item.title: [508] bulby tokkulscape. how to make ::bank command for all players
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Right now it’s under the condition of ‘playerrights >=2;’

Just move the command up closer to the other all player commands. For example, move it right under ‘::players’

code:[code] } else if (cmd[0].equals(“bank”)) {
p.openBank();

        }[/code]

how do i change that to make it work for all players? thats in packets/commands.java
